title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 326.12 - Research
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 326.12 - Research

State Regulations

The commissioner, in a manner prescribed by him, may permit
the purchase, possession and use of any restricted pesticide listed in section
326.2
of this Part for research
purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
326.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
